Asteroid designations ( Number, Name, Temporary designation): 99942, Apophis, 2004_MN4
Observation was done on (UT) (format YYYY-MM-DD-hh): 2000 - 01 - 01 - 00:00
Observation was made by : Davide Perna E-mail; davide.perna@obspm.fr
At observatory with UAI code: 950
Obsv. comments: Ambigous date
The spectrum was published in the article: http://www.oa-roma.inaf.it/planet/NEOSURFACE.html
The normalization of this spectrum was made for the wavelength: 0.550 microns.
Original name of the file was: apophis_gr1.txt
